chapter.text: 76|1|Ren queshi jingli yige shiqi, bushi yi jian keyi jinian de shiwu.
76|2|Wo que yi yong hunhe de jingye chuangzao ren, bing jiayi shiyan, jiang ta chuangzao cheng congming de.
76|3|Wo que yi zhiyin ta zhengdao, ta huo shi ganxie, huo shi gufu.
76|4|Wo que yi wei bu xin zhe yubei xuduo tie lian, tie quan he huo yu.
76|5|Shan renmen bidei yin hanyou zhangnao de liquan,
76|6|ji an la de zhong pu suo yin de yidao quanshui, tamen jiang shi ta daliang yong chu.
76|7|Tamen luxing shiyuan, bing weiju zainan pu jiang ri.
76|8|Tamen wei xi'ai an la er zhenji pinmin, gu'er, fulu.
76|9|“Women zhi wei qiu de an la de enci he xiyue, er zhenji nimen, women bu wang nimen de baochou he ganxie.
76|10|Women dique weiju cong women de zhu fachu de yanku de yi ri.
76|11|Gu an la jiang wei tamen fangyu na ri de zainan, bing shangci tamen guanghua he kuaile.
76|12|Ta jiang yin tamen de jianren er yi leyuan he sichou baochou tamen.
76|13|Tamen zai leyuan zhong, kao zai chuangshang, bu jue yanre, ye bu jue yanhan.
76|14|Leyuan de yin ying fu bizhe tamen, leyuan de guoshi, tamen rongyi caizhai.
76|15|Jiang youren zai tamen zhi jian chuandi yin pan he boli bei
76|16|jingying ru boli de yinbei, tamen yuding mei bei de rongliang.
76|17|Tamen de yong naxie bei yin hanyou jiang zhi de liquan,
76|18|ji leyuan zhong youming de qing kuai quan.
76|19|Xuduo changsheng bulao de shaonian, lunliuzhe fushi tamen. Dang ni kanjian naxie shaonian de shihou, ni yiwei tamen shi xie sanman de zhenzhu.
76|20|Dang ni guankan nali de shihou, ni hui kanjian enze he daguo.
76|21|Tamen jiang chuanzhuo ling luo jinduan de lu pao, tamen jiang xiangshou yin zhuo de zhuangshi, tamen de zhu, jiang yi chunjie de yinliao shangci tamen.
76|22|(Jiang dui tamen shuo)“zhe que shi nimen de baochou, nimen de laoji shi you baochou de.”
76|23|Wo que yi jiang “gulanjing” lingxing di jiang shi ni,
76|24|gu ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue. Ni buyao shuncong tamen zhong renhe fanzui de ren, huo gu en de ren.
76|25|Ni yingdang zhaoxi jinian ni de zhu de zun ming,
76|26|yeli, ni yingdang yi xiao bu fen shijian xiang ta koutou, yi da bu fen shijian zansong ta.
76|27|Zhe deng ren dique shi aihao xianshi, er hushi weilai de yanzhong de yi ri
76|28|wo chuangzaole tamen, bing shi tamen de tige jianshi. Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang yi xiang tamen yiyang de ren daiti tamen.
76|29|Zhe que shi jiaohui, shei yuanyi juewu, shei keyi xuanze yitiao tongda ta de zhu de daolu.
76|30|Chu an la yiyu wai, nimen jue bu yiyu. An la shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de.
76|31|Ta shi tasuo yiyu de ren, ru zai ta de ci'en zhong. Zhiyu bu yi de ren, ta yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa.
